p: Endemic childhood gastroenteritis is caused mainly by rotavirus and, to a lesser extent, astrovirus, enteric adenovirus, and sapoviruses. Epidemic gastroenteritis is primarily caused by noroviruses though outbreaks due to rotavirus, astrovirus, and sapovirus have also been reported. The distribution of various viruses among cases of gastroenteritis is given in TableÂ 4.2.
